website_summaries.verdict: Adorable stickers with kid-approved designs that are easy to peel, stick, and remove. PVC material and fun graphics give kids memorable experiences.
pros: Generous praise for their numerous designs with cool graphics and themes that correlate to events, seasons, and holidays throughout the year
Stickers are made of PVC, so they are reasonably durable and not likely to tear
Set includes a sheet of glow-in-the-dark stickers that kids love
cons: Rare reports of a few faulty stickers

customer_reviews.title: These are really nice quality and have great variety
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice quality and have great variety. However, several sheets were diecut wrong, so the stickers weren’t centered even close to the cut patterns. Also if you’re buying these as a teacher, know that each sheet has a very wide variety of sticker sizes, which makes it hard to use on a class set of grading - Who gets the giant fire truck, and who gets the tiny toolbox? Also the construction worker/police/firefighter sheet was very gender stereotyped. Again the quality is very nice (durable vinyl with bright colors), and it’s a huge pack. I’m not entirely disappointed with the purchase, but it just wasn’t right for me as a teacher, and I wouldn’t buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Chocolate Chip Cookie

customer_reviews.title: Great for both the young and old
customer_reviews.text: Both my children love these (2 and 8 years old). I can back to buy more and figured I would leave a review. My oldest loves to color with crayons and apply the stickers into he drawings. My youngest enjoys just sticking them into a pile on paper. But I love that these are easy for her to remove unlike many other stickers. I'm a real person leaving a review. I was NOT given a discount or incentive to write this review.
customer_reviews.author: Private Profile

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the little one
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old loves stickers and she loves these. She has a ton to choose from and she sticks them all over her coloring books and other paper we give her. Fortunately, for us anyways, they are not super super sticky because she has tried to stick them on the floor. I have 2 complaints. Some of the stickers are not cut out correctly cutting parts of the sticker off. Also part of the clear plastic over the top of the stickers to make it glossy has peeled off and ended up making a big sticky mess. Otherwise it was well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Sudzy 1

customer_reviews.title: Good product.  Great value.
customer_reviews.text: These stickers cover a variety of subjects including holidays, transportation, sports, the beach and travel, letters and numbers, dinosaurs, medical, food, animals, school, positive reinforcement, and more. They are high quality, easy to remove with no danger of tearing and have good adherence. I really liked it when I changed my mind about what sticker to use and I was able to remove it from the paper with no problem and put it back on the original sheet. Whew! Mistake avoided! They come in a convenient, sturdy box that makes them easy and compact to store, and keeps them safe from damage.
customer_reviews.author: GracieB

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in perfect condition. Packaging is great for storage
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I ordered. Arrived in perfect condition. Packaging is great for storage. Assortment is very good. Stickers are all good sizes for little hands. There are two sheets of each design. Themes include: fast food, USA, school, Valentine, St. Patrick's Day, Halloween, animals, smileys, carnival, sports, Christmas, summer, dinosaurs and more. Perfect for grade school, middle school, scrap-booking and more.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Great product and company!
customer_reviews.text: The stickers are a nice quality and the designs are very cute! We all love them and I appreciate that there are 2 identical sheets of each design so my kids each get their own sheet (no fighting over stickers). The stickers have a shiny coating on them which keeps them from tearing, and makes them easier to remove if they are stuck where they shouldn't be (like furniture). I had an issue with one sheet of stickers having a defect, and the company was very responsive with making my order right. I highly recommend the product and the company. I will be ordering from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I love these stickers! I just bought a 2020 planner and wanted some stickers to spice up my pages! These are ADORABLE. Two pages of each sheet which is great. Good quality stickers.
customer_reviews.author: Tameara

customer_reviews.title: 2 thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these stickers!!! Wide variety, common-sense assortment, nice gloss/finish, contemporary look to items (why do other sticker packs look like they got stuck in the 50s??), & I like the easy to handle, individual pages. My only complaint is that there weren't more!
customer_reviews.author: RareForm

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous sticker assortment!
customer_reviews.text: I love the variety of stickers included in this bundle! They are perfect for the crafting project I'm planning to start soon. Thank you for offering such great quality stickers at such an affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Coyle, Book Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: These are Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing! I am always on the hunt for entertaining stickers for rewards and for our sticker book we work on while in restaurants. This fits the bill perfectly. Easily packed up and kept organized. They are colorful and perfect for kids. I wish I had found this company when my daughter was younger, but I'm looking forward to getting more from them in the future (birthday party favors especially).
customer_reviews.author: Morgan N.

customer_reviews.title: Best value
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome I gave each of my kids a few sheets in their Easter baskets and plan to give them a few at a time and use the others for scrapbooking. I looked at a lot of different stickers and in the end I think these were the best value
customer_reviews.author: Mary holtkamp

customer_reviews.title: Skip this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like these but the stickers are very kindergarten ...I honestly have no use for any of them. I bought them for a scrapbook, old movie tickets, etc. the stickers look like something I’d find in a dollar store....if that makes sense. Not cute....nothing I could use for my scrapbook. Thumbs down. They are “year round” themed but look very cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Giovanna

customer_reviews.title: Perfect - easy to stick and remove, won't rip
customer_reviews.text: These stickers are perfect. They are easy to peel off the backing, easy to stick, remove, and restick. They don't rip. There are a couple of sheets of glow-in-the-dark that aren't the same material as the rest, and those do rip, but the 1700+ others are great. So many themes and a lot of fun!
customer_reviews.author: francocaro

customer_reviews.title: Very cute!
customer_reviews.text: I received them today. They are in a cardboard box which contains them nicely. They are adorable & a good quality. Two sheets of each kind. My only complaint is that the “sports” pages do not contain fishing items. They might be a bit dated - the Nintendo Gameboy shown looks like the one we had almost 20 years ago. :)
customer_reviews.author: Jodi B.

customer_reviews.title: A lot of stickers for not much $
customer_reviews.text: These stickers are pretty cute! I like that there's a lot of them! Things I didn't like were the smell and that they all have a white border around them so when you use them, you can see that white border. Not so great when you're using them for scrapbooking on anything besides white paper. Great value for the price though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These stickers arrived as described and are great all around
customer_reviews.text: These stickers arrived as described and are great all around. The variety goes well beyond seasonal themes and the graphics are pleasant. Which is good because they'll soon be plastered all over my house by my three-year old who is already a very big fan of these.
customer_reviews.author: mf000

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever!
customer_reviews.text: Love! My toddler loves stickers more than anything. She usually struggles with peeling them off, but these are perfect! Plus she likes to stick them on everything from walls to cabinets, from doors to mirrors, and they come off easily with no residue!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.text: I love the quality and variety of the stickers. My kids were super excited to get these as a birthday present. There are two sheets of each design which is great since I have twins. That means no fighting over the favorites.

customer_reviews.text: Amazing sticker packet!!! Great for teachers (lesson planners) and scrapbookers. Plenty of stickers for all kinds of things!!

customer_reviews.title: Stickers Galore!
customer_reviews.text: If you like stickers, this pack is for you! I use them in my Bullet Journal. There are so many to choose from and half the fun is deciding which one(s) to use. So glad I bought this item.

customer_reviews.title: High quality and variety!
customer_reviews.text: Product and customer service was wonderful! When my nephew asked for stickers for every holiday as his Christmas gift this delivered on that plus much much more. Stickers were packaged nicely and were of a very high-quality. There is a child in your life who enjoys stickers or being creative this is a wonderful item to get them the variety is great and it provides hours of fun !

customer_reviews.title: Great choice
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my grandnieces (ages 3 and 8). Great selections. Took them to them today. Both loved them and stared playing with them. Such a huge selection that each was able to find things they got really excited about (3year old lives monkeys )

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love the stickers
customer_reviews.text: I am a volunteer at an elementary school and my kids requested sticker. The Year-Round Seasonal Stickers seemed to have the variety I was looking for so I ordered them. I absolutely love the stickers! There is a vast variety that caters to both girls and boys. My kids will have so many options to choose from. The stickers are really detailed and have great color. I’m very happy and satisfied with my order!

customer_reviews.title: Good for paper, not skin
customer_reviews.text: These do not stick well on skin. They claim to, but they definitely do not. They do work well on paper, though, and do not leave behind a residue which is nice. I just wish they stuck on skin. That’s my daughter’s favorite part of a sticker! Putting it on mommy’s face!

This is something I would buy again.

product_meta.title: Year-Round Seasonal Sticker Bulk Pack for Kids - Assorted 1786 PCS - 20 THEMES - Perfect For Teachers, School, Students, Toddlers, Scrapbooking. Incl. All Major Holidays, Seasons, Special Fun Themes
feature_bullets: ✮ UNMATCHED VARIETY FOR YEAR ROUND USE - 20 assorted fun-packed themes, nearly 900 unique stickers, 2 of each one (1786 total!). Includes 40 sheets covering ALL seasons, holidays, school themes, and more! Perfect, convenient size: 7.9 in x 5.9 in.

✮ KEEP KIDS BUSY – Good luck keeping their hands off these crafts! Perfect for boys AND girls. A teacher’s secret weapon to keep active students and toddlers engaged. Helps keep your classroom in control!

✮ NO CRUMPLED STICKERS – Avoid bad folds and protect the sheets with our easy-storage box. We made it easy to carry stickers to your favorite events. Bring them in bulk on a field trip - great for rewarding good behavior.

✮ QUALITY STICKERS – Start scrapbooking with premium sticker packs. Colors are crisp, no-bleeding. Sticks on your t-shirt for the whole day! We use quality PVC material, they’re harder to tear and easy to peel off. No more residue from cheap paper lookalikes.

✮ SAFE FOR KIDS – From elementary to middle school, kids love to touch everything and anything in sight. Luckily our stickers are safe for skin and 100% NON-TOXIC. Keeping kids safe while they craft is our biggest priority!
